code_value: Questions 1~2 You want to know something about posting a parcel to the U.S. Ask the postman two questions about it. </br>Questions 3~4 You are invited to a party held by your friend Tom. Ask him two questions about the party.
Questions 1~2 You want to know something about posting a parcel to the U.S. Ask the postman two questions about it.
Questions 3~4 You are invited to a party held by your friend Tom. Ask him two questions about the party.
